price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߠߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߢߍ߫ ߘߏ߲߰ ߘߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߫ ߸ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߖߘߐ߬ߣߍ߲ ߕߏ߫ ߟߐ߬ߓߊ ( ߞߏߢߊ ) ߟߊ߫
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sāʿati mush'fiqūna
